about.title: About
about.text: NASA Explorer is a personal project created by Sumedh for learning and development purposes. It provides a creative interface to explore NASA data and APIs, and is not affiliated with or endorsed by NASA.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.text: Have feedback or want to connect? Email me or find me on GitHub.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This project is for educational and demonstration purposes only. All NASA data is sourced from public APIs. No commercial use intended.

apod: Did you know? The speed of light is about 299,792 kilometers per second!
A day on Venus is longer than its year.
Neutron stars can spin at a rate of 600 rotations per second.
The Milky Way galaxy will collide with Andromeda in about 4 billion years!
mars: Mars is home to the tallest volcano in the solar system, Olympus Mons!
A year on Mars is 687 Earth days.
Mars has two moons: Phobos and Deimos.
The first successful Mars rover was Sojourner in 1997.
Mars is often called the 'Red Planet' due to iron oxide (rust) on its surface.
neo: The largest known asteroid is Ceres, almost 1,000 km wide!
Most NEOs are less than 1 km in diameter.
NASA tracks thousands of NEOs to protect Earth.
The Chelyabinsk meteor in 2013 was about 20 meters wide!
An asteroid impact 66 million years ago contributed to the extinction of the dinosaurs.
